document_data.name: Sphene
document_data.mainbody: '''Sphene''' was a [[Precious stones|precious stone]] that came in many colors and, like [[scapra]], was easily worked by unskilled cutters.
document_data.Description: Sphene was a soft, brittle gemstone that came in shades of yellow to deep green with a fine emerald green as the most prized hue. Sphene crystals could be cut into beautiful, sparkling, faceted gems of small to medium size. A typical specimen had a base value of 500 gp.
document_data.Powers: Wearers of this stone may not have known it, but they were much less likely to be hit by lightning or lightning-like spells or effects. And if they were struck, the damage not as bad as it might have been.
